rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception counter and built-in display units.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room adjoining the central courtyard with large windows to let natural light in.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to an outdoor dining terrace overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A bedroom designed for guests with en-suite bathroom and private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with walk-in closet and private balcony adjacent to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with a dedicated dining counter, ventilation and ample storage, following Vastu guidelines for food preparation.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area including laundry and storage facilities.

openings.location: Front of the farmhouse, facing the main road, ensuring proper alignment with Vastu principles.
Adjacent to living room and bedrooms for natural light circulation
Central courtyard opening leading to the garden and other outdoor areas.

courtyard.description: A central courtyard serving as a communal space with natural light and ventilation, bordered by the living room, dining area, and guest spaces.

elements.description: A small pond or fountain placed in the northeast corner to balance energy.
Planted areas and shrubs along the perimeter to promote serenity.

garden.description: Expansive garden area with diverse landscaping, including flower beds, vegetable patches, and an outdoor seating area. Design adheres to local climate considerations.

features.description: A shaded sitting area for relaxation and gatherings.
Winding pathways connecting different sections of the garden.

vastu_overview.note: The design respects traditional Vastu principles by ensuring proper orientation, directional alignments and natural ventilation through strategic placement of rooms and openings.
vastu_overview.advisory: Consult local building norms and obtain necessary permits before construction.
